General.Name: Zhejiang Xianju Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Xianju Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells steroids and hormones worldwide. The company offers gynecological, anesthesia, respiratory, dermatology, generic drug, and other products; and active pharmaceutical ingredients (API), such as corticosteroids, sex hormone, progesterone, non-hormone series, newchem API, and intermediates products. The company was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Xianju, China.
